languages.text: Единица Авель Ханейманн продолжила служение Коллективу Амарнат. В единстве с пятью со-мышленниками ему вновь было открыто счастье прямой когнитивной коммуникации, не замутненной дарованной от рождения инаковостью. Оставаясь безмолвным снаружи, он радостно описывал образы, концепции и идеи, которые ему открывал Омниссия, чем исполнял свою функцию и преисполнялся наслаждения эффективностью.

The unit Abel Haneumann continued his service to the Amarnat Collective. In unity with five companion minds, he rediscovered the joy of direct cognitive communication, unmarred by inborn otherness. While outwardly silent, he joyfully described the images, concepts, and ideas that the Omnissiah revealed to him. Fulfilling his function, he overflowed with the exultation of efficiency.
languages.original_text: Единица Авель Ханейманн продолжила служение Коллективу Амарнат. В единстве с пятью со-мышленниками ему вновь было открыто счастье прямой когнитивной коммуникации, не замутненной дарованной от рождения инаковостью. Оставаясь безмолвным снаружи, он радостно описывал образы, концепции и идеи, которые ему открывал Омниссия, чем исполнял свою функцию и преисполнялся наслаждения эффективностью.

traits.locale_text: The unit Abel Haneumann continued its service for the Amarnat Collective. In unity with five co-thinkers, he rediscovered the joy of direct cognitive communication, not stained by inborn otherness. Staying silent on the outside, he joyfully described images, conceptions, and ideas that the Omnissiah opened to him. Fulfilling his function, he was overflowing with exultation of his efficiency.

languages.text: 亚伯·哈努曼继续为阿玛纳特聚合意识服务。他与五位同伴的意识联成一体，重新找到了直接认知交流的乐趣。哪怕是天生的差异性，也无法玷污这样的快乐。尽管亚伯看起来沉默寡言，但他愉快地描述了欧姆尼塞亚向他揭示的图像、概念和想法。他履行了自己的职责，心中洋溢着效率带来的喜悦。
languages.original_text: The unit Abel Haneumann continued his service to the Amarnat Collective. In unity with five companion minds, he rediscovered the joy of direct cognitive communication, unmarred by inborn otherness. While outwardly silent, he joyfully described the images, concepts, and ideas that the Omnissiah revealed to him. Fulfilling his function, he overflowed with the exultation of efficiency.

traits.locale_text: 亚伯·哈努曼继续为阿玛纳特聚合意识服务。他与五位同伴联成一体，重新找到了直接认知交流的乐趣。哪怕是天生的差异性，也无法玷污这样的快乐。尽管亚伯看起来沉默寡言，但他愉快地描述了欧姆尼塞亚向他揭示的图像、概念和想法。他履行了自己的职责，心中洋溢着效率带来的喜悦。

languages.text: Die Einheit Abel Haneumann setzte ihren Dienst für das Amarnat-Kollektiv fort. Gemeinsam mit fünf Kameraden entdeckte er die Freuden der direkten kognitiven Kommunikation neu, unbefleckt von angeborener Andersartigkeit. Nach außen hin war er stumm, doch er beschrieb voller Freuden die Bilder, Konzepte und Ideen, die der Omnissiah ihm eröffnete. Die Erfüllung seiner Funktion erfüllte ihn mit der erhabenen Freude der Effizienz.
languages.original_text: The unit Abel Haneumann continued his service to the Amarnat Collective. In unity with five companion minds, he rediscovered the joy of direct cognitive communication, unmarred by inborn otherness. While outwardly silent, he joyfully described the images, concepts, and ideas that the Omnissiah revealed to him. Fulfilling his function, he overflowed with the exultation of efficiency.

languages.text: L'unité Abel Haneumann continua à œuvrer pour le collectif Amarnat. Uni à ses cinq pairs, il redécouvrit les joies de la communication cognitive directe, jamais compromise par l'altérité individuelle. Silencieux en apparence, il décrivait avec joie les images, concepts et idées auxquels l'Omnimessie lui avait permis d'accéder. L'efficacité avec laquelle il exerçait sa fonction l'emplissait de joie.
languages.original_text: The unit Abel Haneumann continued his service to the Amarnat Collective. In unity with five companion minds, he rediscovered the joy of direct cognitive communication, unmarred by inborn otherness. While outwardly silent, he joyfully described the images, concepts, and ideas that the Omnissiah revealed to him. Fulfilling his function, he overflowed with the exultation of efficiency.

traits.locale_text: L'unité Abel Haneumann continua à œuvrer pour le collectif Amarnat. Uni à ses cinq pairs, il redécouvrit les joies de la communication cognitive directe, jamais compromise par l’altérité individuelle. Silencieux en apparence, il décrivait avec joie les images, les concepts et les idées auxquels l'Omnimessie lui avait permis d'accéder. L'efficacité avec laquelle il exerçait sa fonction l'emplissait de joie.

languages.text: La unidad Abel Haneumann continuó sirviendo al colectivo Amarnat. Al unirse a cinco mentes compañeras, redescubrió las maravillas de la comunicación cognitiva directa, libre de toda alteridad nata. Mientras aparentaba guardar silencio, describía felizmente las imágenes, conceptos e ideas que el Omnissiah le había revelado. El cumplimiento de sus funciones le llenaba con el júbilo de la eficiencia.
languages.original_text: The unit Abel Haneumann continued his service to the Amarnat Collective. In unity with five companion minds, he rediscovered the joy of direct cognitive communication, unmarred by inborn otherness. While outwardly silent, he joyfully described the images, concepts, and ideas that the Omnissiah revealed to him. Fulfilling his function, he overflowed with the exultation of efficiency.

traits.locale_text: La unidad Abel Haneumann continuó sirviendo al colectivo Amarnat. Al unirse a cinco compañeros, redescubrió las maravillas de la comunicación cognitiva directa, libre de toda alteridad nata. Mientras aparentaba guardar silencio, describía felizmente las imágenes, conceptos e ideas que el Omnissiah le había mostrado. El cumplimiento de sus funciones le llenaba con el júbilo de la eficiencia.

languages.text: アベル・ヘニュマンは、アマルナト集合体への奉仕活動を続けた。5人の仲間たちとの一体感の中で、彼は先天的な他者性に汚されることのない、直接的な認知的コミュニケーションの喜びを再発見した。表向きは沈黙しつつも、彼は万機神が自分に啓示したイメージ、概念、アイデアを喜々として語った。自分の役割を果たすことで、彼は効率的な高揚感に満たされていた。
languages.original_text: The unit Abel Haneumann continued his service to the Amarnat Collective. In unity with five companion minds, he rediscovered the joy of direct cognitive communication, unmarred by inborn otherness. While outwardly silent, he joyfully described the images, concepts, and ideas that the Omnissiah revealed to him. Fulfilling his function, he overflowed with the exultation of efficiency.

traits.locale_text: アベル・ヘニュマンは、アマルナト集合体への奉仕活動を続けた。5人の仲間たちとの一体感の中で、彼は先天的な他者性に汚されることのない、直接的な認知的コミュニケーションの喜びを再発見した。表向きは沈黙しつつも、彼は万機神が自分に啓示したイメージ、概念、アイデアを喜々として語った。自分の役割を果たすことで、彼は効率的な高揚感に満たされていた。

languages.text: Abel Haneumann birimi, Amarnat Bütünlüğü'nün hizmetinde kalmayı sürdürdü. Beş yoldaşının zihniyle uyum buldu, ötekilik hissiyatının zincirlerinden kurtuldu ve doğrudan bilişsel iletişimin güzelliğini yeniden keşfetti. Görünürde sessiz olsa da Hermesih'in ona açık ettiği imgeleri, konseptleri ve fikirleri tanımlarken neşe buluyordu. İşlevini yerine getirdiği ve verimli olduğu için içi iftihar hissiye dolup taştı.
languages.original_text: The unit Abel Haneumann continued his service to the Amarnat Collective. In unity with five companion minds, he rediscovered the joy of direct cognitive communication, unmarred by inborn otherness. While outwardly silent, he joyfully described the images, concepts, and ideas that the Omnissiah revealed to him. Fulfilling his function, he overflowed with the exultation of efficiency.

traits.locale_text: Abel Haneumann birimi, Amarnat Bütünlüğü'nün hizmetinde kalmayı sürdürdü. Beş eşlikçisinin zihniyle uyum hâlindeyken, içinden gelen ötekilik hissiyatının zincirlerinden kurtuldu ve doğrudan bilişsel iletişimin güzelliğini yeniden keşfetti. Görünürde sessiz olsa da, Hermesih'in ona açık ettiği imgeleri, konseptleri ve fikirleri tanımlarken neşe içinde oluyordu. İşlevini yerine getirdi ve verimli olduğu için içi iftihar hissiye dolup taştı.
